name: @nikolas.karinja/app-utils
description: Functions and Classes that make the creation of your JavaScript app easier.

scripts.push: npm run build && git add . && git commit -am "Publishing to NPM" && git push && git push origin && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run link-it
scripts.test: npm run build && cd testing && npm test
scripts.update-all: npm update && cd testing && npm update

author: Nikolas Karinja
